contents:
我根本懒得去验证你讲的内容的可信度也懒得反驳你，因为whataboutism的本质只是对话题的逃避，...

The Marriage Act 1961 and Marriage Regulations 2017 set the rules for getting married in Australia.
...
give it to an authorised marriage celebrant at least 1 month (but not more than 18 months) before your wedding
...
The Family Law Act 1975 established the principle of no-fault divorce in Australian law.
...
You must have been separated for at least 12 months and one day in order to satisfy the Court that the marriage has broken down irretrievably.
...
没别的意思，就事论事，就是举个反例反驳“冷静期是对婚姻自由的破坏”。不愿验证反驳，一上来就人身攻击和扣帽子，不用回复了。
